queryMap.query: SELECT ROWNUM ROW_ID , MN_ID , MN_NM , ORD_NO , UP_MN_ID , SCRN_ID , URL , RMK , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , DECODE(PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'Y',PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'N') PERSONAL_DATA_MN FROM TBDM_MN WHERE UP_MN_ID = '000000000' ORDER BY ORD_NO ASC

SELECT '0' AS CHK , ROWNUM ROW_ID , MN_ID , MN_NM , ORD_NO , UP_MN_ID , SCRN_ID , URL , RMK , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , DECODE(PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'Y',PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'N') PERSONAL_DATA_MN FROM TBDM_MN WHERE UP_MN_ID = '000000000' AND MN_ID = NVL(?, MN_ID) ORDER BY ORD_NO ASC

/* SELECT MN_ID , MN_NM , ORD_NO , UP_MN_ID , UPMNNM , SCRN_ID , URL , RMK , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , CASE WHEN UP_MN_ID = '000000000' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END ISTOP , DECODE(PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'Y',PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'N') PERSONAL_DATA_MN FROM TBDM_MN START WITH UP_MN_ID = ? CONNECT BY UP_MN_ID = PRIOR MN_ID order siblings by UP_MN_ID, ORD_NO */
SELECT /* tbdm_mn_fm002 */ A.* ,B.MN_NM AS UPMNNM FROM ( SELECT '0' AS CHK , MN_ID , MN_NM , ORD_NO , UP_MN_ID , SCRN_ID , URL , RMK , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , CASE WHEN UP_MN_ID = '000000000' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END ISTOP , DECODE(PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'Y',PERSONAL_DATA_MN,'N') PERSONAL_DATA_MN FROM TBDM_MN START WITH UP_MN_ID = ? CONNECT BY UP_MN_ID = PRIOR MN_ID order siblings by UP_MN_ID, ORD_NO ) A ,TBDM_MN B WHERE A.UP_MN_ID = B.MN_ID

INSERT INTO TBDM_MN ( MN_ID , MN_NM , ORD_NO , UP_MN_ID , SCRN_ID , URL , RMK , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , PERSONAL_DATA_MN ) VALUES ( ? -- MN_ID , ? -- MN_NM , ? -- ORD_NO , ? -- UP_MN_ID , ? -- SCRN_ID , ? -- URL , ? -- RMK , ? -- INST_ID , SYSDATE -- INST_DTM , ? -- UPDT_ID , SYSDATE -- UPDT_DTM , ? -- PERSONAL_DATA_MN )
UPDATE TBDM_MN SET MN_NM = ? , UP_MN_ID = ? , SCRN_ID = ? , URL = ? , RMK = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , ORD_NO = ? , PERSONAL_DATA_MN = ? WHERE MN_ID = ?
